welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bad Essen, the charming town known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the hidden treasures this city has to offer. Have a wonderful time exploring!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Guetersloh Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
